messages.subject: Samurai Warriors on the History Channel
messages.msgSnippet: Today at 3:00 PM Eastern Time there is going to be a program on the History Channel called Samurai Warriors. Don t know if it will be any good or not, but I
messages.messageBody:
Today at 3:00 PM Eastern Time there is going to be a program on the
History Channel called Samurai Warriors. Don't know if it will be any
good or not, but I thought I'd give everyone a heads up.

-MissBehavin
